mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person_inout_record (company_code, idcard, person_name, person_type, in_out_state, in_out_time, image_file_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{companyCode}, #{idcard}, #{personName}, #{personType}, #{inOutState}, #{inOutTime}, #{imageFileId}, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.select: SELECT id, company_code, idcard, person_name, person_type, in_out_state, in_out_time, image_file_id FROM person_inout_record WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE person_inout_record SET company_code = #{companyCode}, idcard = #{idcard}, person_name = #{personName}, person_type = #{personType}, in_out_state = #{inOutState}, in_out_time = #{inOutTime}, image_file_id = #{imageFileId}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
